meaning_str.bing:
n. 垃圾；废弃物
v. 拒绝；回绝；推却；不准许
adj. 无价值的
网络. 谢绝；废物；拒用

拒绝；拒绝给予；谢绝；回绝；抵制；推却；不接受；拒收；（马）拒绝（跨栏或其他障碍物）
垃圾；废弃物；废料；废品；渣滓；碎屑；剩余物；废旧物品

1.en: A. It was wise of him to refuse to spend his money.
1.cn: 他拒绝使用他自己的钱是明智的

2.en: He made up his mind to talk to the girl about his plan, even though he knew she might very well refuse to listen.
2.cn: 他决心向那个女孩谈自己的计划，即使他知道，她很可能拒绝听。

3.en: When he or she said to accompany me and never let me alone, I do not hesitate to refuse all.
3.cn: 当她或者她说要陪我不再让我孤单的时候，我毫不犹豫地拒绝了所有。

0.en: I wouldn't have the courage to refuse your mother-in-law.

1.en: What? Refuse to play? I've killed an entire species!
1.cn: 什么，拒绝参加？我灭绝了整个虫族。

2.en: And if you refuse to learn that, I guarantee you, you guys will not become the best person you can be.
2.cn: 如果你拒绝学习历史，我保证你们一定无法做到最好的自己。

3.en: Why does anyone do anything? Let me guess, selling secrets? Well, it would be churlish to refuse.
3.cn: 大家都为了什么做事呢？我猜猜，贩卖情报吗？拒绝的话就太无礼了。

4.en: Mr. Asher? On advice of counsel, I refuse to answer on the grounds that my answer may incriminate me.
4.cn: 亚瑟先生，根据律师建议，我拒绝回答，因为我的证言可能会暗示我有罪。

5.en: But there's not one congressperson, Republican or Democrat, that would refuse a meeting with the First Lady.
5.cn: 但国会议员，不管是共和党还是民主党，都不会拒绝跟第一夫人见面。

6.en: Look, you probably can't read, fox, but the sign says we reserve the right to refuse service to anyone! So beat it.
6.cn: 你是不识字吗，狐狸，看这个，我们有权拒绝提供服务，快走吧。

7.en: Now I'm mommy in this little play? Alright look, I refuse to get sucked into this like, weird little Geller dimension thing OK.
7.cn: 现在我变成妈咪了，好，听着，我拒绝卷入这一类畸型的盖勒家庭纠纷。

8.en: A deal. We need a deal, right? A deal. We need a deal we can afford. We need a deal that they're not gonna refuse.
8.cn: 我们需要一笔生意，对吗？生意，一笔能我们担得起的生意，一笔别人不会拒绝的生意。

9.en: I'm not a stop along the way, I'm a destination. And if you refuse to attend, I'm gonna have to find a replacement. Girls, the waiting list.
9.cn: 我不是个中途站，我是终点，如果你拒绝参加，我会找个代替者的，女孩们，候选名单。

10.en: And Amy never joins us for Sunday dinners because you refuse to go out on a school night. I can go out on a school night as long as I'm in my PJs by 10:00.
10.cn: 艾米从来不来吃周日晚餐因为你拒绝在上学前夜外出。我可以在上学前夜外出只要我晚上10点穿上睡衣就行。

11.en: And I've lost what little family I had, and I refuse to lose anyone else.
11.cn: 我失去了仅剩不多的亲人，我不愿再失去任何人了。

12.en: And you're telling me there's nothing you can do? I refuse to believe that.
12.cn: 而你告诉我你无能为力？我不相信。

13.en: What if they don't either? What if all of us refuse to shoot first? We might still end up dead.
13.cn: 那他们也不想呢？如果所有人都不想动手呢？我们最后还是会死。

14.en: How often do we get so lost in what we think, that we refuse to listen to what the other side has to say?
14.cn: 我们是否常常会沉迷于自我以至于听不进对方说的任何事情呢？

15.en: Brian, speak. You're contractually bound to the show for another two years. Okay. All right, and if I refuse?
15.cn: 布莱恩，说话。你跟节目组签的合同还有两年才到期。好吧。好吧，如果我不演呢？

16.en: I refuse to sink to his level. You can't sink. With all that helium in you, you're lucky you don't float away.
16.cn: 我才不要堕落到他那种水准。你落不了，体内充满了氦气，遇水不飘走就算你走运啦。

17.en: I don't want those memories erased by the struggle to fit behind a table, the taxi drivers who refuse to take me.
17.cn: 我不想让那些记忆被抹去，要坐着轮椅挤到桌边，还有那些拒载我的出租车司机们。

18.en: I don't care. It's demeaning. And I refuse to be trotted out and shown off like a prize hog at the Texas State Fair.
18.cn: 我不管，这太下作了，我不愿想像只德州博览会的冠军猪一样被人领着到处表演。

19.en: I can't do it. You can let them but you refuse to. Your play's incredible. You know? The whole world from your bedroom.
19.cn: 我不能这么做。他们可以跳的，只是你自己不想让他们跳罢了。你戏剧写得真好。你知道吗？整个世界都在你的卧室。
